inclusion.criterion: Age greater than 18 years and older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Known serum HBsAg positivity for 24 weeks
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Detectable HBV DNA greater than 10(4) IU/ml
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum alanine aminotransferase (ALT) or aspartate aminotransferase (AST) levels 1.5 times the upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Liver biopsy within 2 years of entry that is consistent with chronic hepatitis and with a histology activity index (HAI) score of 4 or more
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Previous or current treatment with tenofovir or emtricitabine
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Co-infection with hepatitis delta virus (HDV) as defined by the presence of anti-HDV in serum and/or HDV antigen in the liver
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Co-infection with hepatitis c virus (HCV) as defined by the presence of HCV RNA in serum
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Decompensated liver disease as defined by serum bilirubin greater than 2.5 milligram per deciliter
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a history of HCV and recent coinfection with HBV, but no evidence of decompensated liver disease or co-infection with HDV.
